item.title: Hugo Migration Implementation Summary
item.description: Hugo Migration Implementation Summary Status: Active Overview This document provides a summary of the Hugo static site implementation for the ScopeCam MCP documentation. Phase 1 of the migration has been successfully completed, providing a solid foundation for the project’s documentation in Hugo format.
